pkgmetadata.longdescription: Prox - the tool to check how bad your proxy list is===================================================Installation------------.. code:: bash pip3 install -U proxHow to check the proxy list---------------------------You have to provide at least the type and location of proxy list.If the proxylist located at http://example.com/abc.txt:.. code:: bash prox_check socks URL http://example.com/abc.txtIf the list is in local file:.. code:: bash prox_check socks path/to/file.txtHow to check multiple lists---------------------------Create file foo.yml like:.. code:: text config: save: 1 task: - proxy_type: socks plist_url: var/plist1.txt limit: 100 - proxy_type: http plist_url: http://example.com/servers.txt limit: 100It should by YML list of tasks. Each task contains key names sameas check_plist.py command line arguments.Run the command:.. code:: bash prox_task foo.ymlThe tool to filter proxy list by countries------------------------------------------Use `prox_geo` command with `--stat` option to see number of proxies grouped by country.Use `prox_geo` command with `-i`, `-x` and `--exclude-list` options to filter proxy list
